Spokane.Spokane College of English Language:
Spokane College of English Language (known as SCEL) is an English language college in Spokane, Washington, United States. The college is located in downtown Spokane, WA.


== School Information ==
School Environment: Located in the old Liberty Theatre building across from the STA bus plaza.
Building: Classrooms and offices, conference area, wi-fi, flat screen televisions


== Facilities ==
Technology: all classrooms equipped with high-speed internet, flat screen televisions, computers
Study Areas with Wi-Fi


== Programs ==
Intensive English: Intensive English Program is designed to improve overall competency in English.
